item.title: Adding <meta> elements to get a Twitter preview
item.description: As you might know, this blog is made using Hugo with the minimal theme . When a post is shared on Twitter, I like to have a nice post preview. TODO! Figure out what data needs to present on a webpage to get a tweet preview. https://t.co/bMJA5uCZ4z — FQ400 (@FQ400) September 23, 2020 This post is about figuring out what I need to add to the page.
